data.actual_result: You get disconnected but your name stays in the preview
data.expected_result: You get disconnected and your name disappears from the preview at the sidebar on who is in the voice channel
data.short_description: Disconnecting from Voice Channel notification doesn't remove you from the voice user list
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1 Connect to a Voice Channel - Step 2 Close the Discord app (minimise also can) - Step 3 Disconnect from the Discord notification
